apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for accessing the gateway

empty.title: No API Keys Yet
empty.description: Create your first API key to start using the gateway

toast.loadFailed: Failed to load API keys. Please try again.
toast.rollSuccess: Key rolled and new secret generated

create.title: Mint New Key
create.subtitle: Create a new API key with custom permissions

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.name: Key Name
basic.nameHint: A memorable name to identify this key

constraints.title: Intelligence Constraints
constraints.description: Set limits to protect your budget and control access
constraints.modelScopeHint: Restrict which AI models this key can access
constraints.modelScopeEmpty: No available models yet. Please create or activate a provider instance.

security.title: Security Settings
security.allowedIPsHint: Leave empty to allow all IPs
security.enableLoggingHint: Log all requests made with this key

reveal.title: Your API Key is Ready
reveal.warning: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
reveal.securityNote: This key grants access to your gateway. Keep it secure and never share it publicly.

revoke.title: Revoke API Key
revoke.description: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? This action cannot be undone.

roll.title: Roll API Key
roll.description: This will generate a new secret for this key. The old secret will stop working immediately.
